name: Tuna "Rice" Casserole Variation
ingredients: 24 ounces fresh cauliflower, shredded, 1 small-medium head

instructions.en: Put the shredded cauliflower in a 3-4 quart casserole with a lid. Add 3 tablespoons of water, cover and microwave on HIGH 8-10 minutes until just tender, stirring every couple minutes. Do not overcook. Stir in 1 tablespoon butter.
Sauté the diced celery in the remaining tablespoon of butter until very tender.
In a medium microwaveable bowl, mix the cheese and cream. Microwave 2 minutes on HIGH to melt the cheese; stir until well blended and creamy.
Whisk in the mayonnaise, seasonings and dry onion to the cheese mixture.
Stir the celery, tuna and mushrooms into the cauliflower; add the cheese sauce and mix well.
Bake, uncovered, at 350°F for 30 minutes until hot and bubbly.

notes: This recipe makes 8 servings. The casserole can be frozen. It can be covered and chilled before baking; add an extra 5-10 minutes to baking time if chilled.
